flawed_nl_solution:
Kirsty has 0.45 * 30 = $<<0.45*30=13.5>>13.5 to spare to buy her models.
She can only buy 13.5 / 0.5 = <<13.5/0.5=72>>72 models as the price of each individual model has increased.
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
